name: Ed, Edd n Eddy: Jawbreakers!
description: Ed, Edd n Eddy: Jawbreakers is a video game released on March 25, 2003, by Cartoon Network Interactive and Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment, based on the popular television cartoon Ed, Edd n Eddy for the Game Boy Advance. It was developed by Climax Group. The game mirrors Ed, Edd (Double D), and Eddy's television quest to make money to buy jawbreakers.
